values:
christina_face


add it <3


thank you manda!

the date on this journal is pissing me off. i dont think i can fix it either. fucker. i need a new journal. but i dont feel like starting a whole new one. but anyways...i dont know if im getting my fishy today :( dave missed his flight but hes getting the 2:00 flight or something and i dont even know where the hell hes at so i dont know how long its going to take him. oh well.

i need to talk to kayla and i dont think she has internet right now. :/ grrr. oh well. im not going to camp this weekend which sucks cuz now i have to stay home but ill just invite people over cuz my dads going away for the weekend and my moms staying here but she doesnt care.

yeah...well thats all i guess..

<3

wow. uhh..ive been gone for 2 weeks. hmmmm. and i read through everybody's journal entries and the only person that actually missed me was tina =/ man. maybe i should go away more often. 

but anyways...hmmmm. wow i had fun up camp. i got drunk a few times and i was high a couple times and stuff but thats ok cuz it was fun. hah. uhmmmm. last saturday? was the first night i got drunk and i was like..doin crazy shit and me and kayla didnt come home til 5 45 in the morning and i just passed out and laid there but then 5 mins later im like..."kayla, i have to piss" so i roll over and fall and then i get up and try to get to the bathroom. wow. crazy. haha. and then a couple days after that, me and kayla walked down to bobbys at 5 45 in the am b/c of donny calling me @ 3 30 in the morning and asking me to come over there so im like.."ill be down @ 6" but i was a half n hour early so i cuddled with him on the couch and fell asleep <3 woo. hes awesome. anyways...thats all i really did is sleep, drink, and eat over bobbys. haha. (22 yr old bobby). oh boy fun fun. then uhmm. oh yes. one night, bobby decided to get drunk and well he took one of bruces white beaters and cut it in half and made a little bra type thing and a skirt and he was naked and it was funny. hahahahaha. 

i dont have that good of a memory. haha. but thats all the good stuff i remember. but yesterday, kaylas cousin John came up cuz they had this big family get together thing and me, kayla, and john hung out and now he likes me and stuff and thats good. he drives, and knows exactly where i live. and he was afraid to ask me out to go out with him sometime soon so pap did it. haha. cute<3 hmmmm. sooo..we played bingo last night and i won $10  bitch! haha. it would of been $20 but some old hag won with me so i only got half. gah. so im like..."thats it, we're going to sheets baby" so we all went ot sheets and i got this yummy thing and a cappichino and i sat in the front with john on the way home and we just drove around the lake and we parked at the stables and we ate and then we went home and walked around and i was going to stay up there today and john was going to drive me home cuz he wanted to but my moms like, "he can just come visit you" and im like.."ok" so..i think we might do something soon. 

yeah so thats all the good shit i can remember but i had so much fun. it was crazy. hahah. definitely better than last year. <3333

im leaving today to go over kaylas =D and then tomorrow we're going to camp for a whole week :)

i wont be home til like..next saturday or sunday..

oh yes. and when dave comes home from vacation, hes taking me out and hes buying me a fishy!!!! :) a beta fishy! *yay* hahaha.

yes..well. dont miss me too much ;)


<3333

once again my mom called this morning and woke me up. soo..i got up b/c i coudlnt fall back asleep so i just came on here for like a half n hour and then i started cleaning. i had to clean my room and kitchen if i wanted to do anything today. gah. i hate cleaning..

i hope kaylas dad allows me to go with them this weekend. Kayla said he probably will but who knows. i have my stuff picked out and..stuff. haha. ill be gone for..a week and like..2 days. :) hopefully..

alrighty. well i think ill go take a nap or something cuz i really didnt get any sleep last night..

peace out gangstassss <3

me and manda left the mall around like 5 and i got home around 5 30 and my mom took me to pick up my pictures i needed developed from the last day of school. haha. i love new pictureesss. :) anyways. all of them pretty much suck. but not all of them. oh yes and theres this pic of me and kristina and i swear we look like we could be sisters. its weird. then theres this pic that i took of good ol' Jd and i remember he got mad cuz he hates pics or something and he threw this pin at me or something. hahaha. but its ok. cuz...uh..jd hates feet? i have to show it to danerr!

hmmm..we saw stef n' megan at the mallll 8) and we saw this old guy in this wheelchair. he was so funny looking and me n' manda couldnt stop laughing but it was sad at the same time i guess...

yeah so thats all ladies n' gents 8)

have a nice fucking day :)

<3

my mom called and woke up me up around 11 just to fucking tell me to take the steaks out of the freezer. so i did and i couldnt find them and i called her back and she got pissed off and hung up on me. i was like. jesus christ. all that over fucking steaks.

but anyways..im going with manda to the mall around..like..3 to go hang out with some guys from Ohio. i dont even know who the hell they are. well. i think i know one of them. but who cares. thats all ill probably do today..

uhmm. thursday, i think im going over kaylas and then im going up camp with her for the weekend til tuesday, thats when my parents come up and then we're on our vacation 8) fun fun.

yeah..well i have to go clean my damn room bitches

<333

i decided to break up with bobby for now. i realized i need sometime to think and stuff. i need to figure out what i really want. i was kinda thinking i liked being single better than being with someone. but who knows. but i have a feeling somethings going to happen. like..that saying "you never know what you have until its gone" or something of that sort. everytime i see bobby im probably going to be all upset and stuff cuz im not going to know what i want. i feel so bad about breaking up with him but i didnt know what i was feeling so i guess thats the only thing i could do...maybe things will change..maybe not. im not sure and i cant really tell..


:/

my mom woke me up today around 10 30 or something and i got dressed and went shopping and i finally dropped off my camera today from the last day of school. and i have to pick them up tomorrow :) yay. pictures. lol. uhmmm. yeah..so we went to kohls and i got 3 pairs of shorts, a shirt, and new bras. oh boy. i hate picking out bras but i had to. and my shirt has these bunnies on them and this heart. its cute. hahah

i dont know what im doing today cuz theres really nothing to do..but ill call tina cuz we were suppose to do something today..

im pissed off b/c my mom doesnt wanna leave for vacation til tuesday now and she wants to come home on saturday. WTF. thats not even a fucking vacation. grrr. oh well. ill talk my dad into staying til sunday. ;p and my mom will have to stay >:/ . but anyways..i think ill go call tina or something now cuz im really freaking bored.

<3

i went to brittanys today and watched Just Married and went on the computer. and talked to bobby and thats about it. i was really tired when i came home from camp but i didnt get to sleep cuz i didnt wanna stay home and ...stuff.

kayla and bruce might get back together. oh the excitement. hahaha. i was fucking right. motha fucka weeeeeee. what now?!

ok yeah. thats enough of that. im sorta hyper and i need a god damn shower fuckers.

<333333333
peace out gangstas

this weekend was pretty fun actually. friday was kinda boring but i slept over megans and that was fun cuz we were prank calling people n' all that good stuff. we watched pet cemetery too and i dont like that movie. cuz its sad when the cute little boy gets hit by the truck. :( and i dont like that damn ugly cat. ok yes..so we didnt get to sleep til 4 30 friday..geez oh man. so yes. uhmmm...saturday..i hung out with kayla all day then zack n' alisa came and that was definitely awesome b/c i miss seeing them everyday :( but basically...we kinda hung out with bobby and bruce a little bit and we went into bobbys house and its so different then last year. theres like..nowhere to go and he has 5 different couches. i was like...dear god how many couches do you need? and he just laughed. i tried not to laugh cuz everytime he saw me he was like..."whats up chick" hahaha. i dont know it was just funny the way he said it. he got a new doggie :) its so cute. lol yeh..so uh..me n' kayla sat around and watched bobby, bruce, compton, some fat kid, and some other kid, and zack play basketball. it was fun. hmmmmm. then i was harassing bruce up at the store..telling him to smell every marker i could find. hahah. i think thats all the fun stuff that happened.

fuckerrrrs

daddi-o is taking a half day and then we're leaving for camp...but it always sucks to leave this early b/c you have to wait for everyone to get there. :/ but oh well.

hmmm. so ladies and gents i think ill be aborting this mission to go finishing packing n' all that good stuff

cya suunnndddaayyy 8) <3

well im leaving tomorrow to go up camp. that should be fun i guess. bobby isnt going to be up there so thats crappy. but kayla is so we can hang out n' stuff. 8) which is definitely awesome cuz i miss her. haha. uhmmm..then next week, i think...i leave for vacation...for a whole week. yu guys are gonna miss me :) right? but of course. well. haha im kidding. people will probably forget im even gone...

today..i have no idea what im doing. i have to clean up the house today which is fucking gay. i just have to do it before my mom comes home cuz shes been getting home early and i dont want her coming home and ripping my head off.

yes. well i suppose ill be getting my shower now

peace out gangstaaas

<33

manda left today around like..11 45 and then i walked up to brittanys a little bit after she left because i didnt wanna stay here for my mom to come home and yell at me like she does...everyday.

soo..i got up there..we watched tv and waited for manda to get there and then we just basically sat there. we were going to take a bus down to oakland or wherever but we ended up not going cuz nobody had any money..

i explained things to brian last night. i felt really really bad and i still feel bad. ive been having this feeling of guilt..before and mostly after i told him. its kinda like a feeling of wanting to fall asleep and never wake up because you know you messed up. i just couldnt sit back and think everything was going to turn out alright and stuff because i know it wasnt. i just had stronger feelings for bobby and im happy that im with him but theres still a part of me that wishes none of this ever happened :/ 

i had many chances of going out with people and this was the one chance that finally worked out and happened and i couldnt pass it up. i just feel really dumb. i dont know. i dont know what else to say except that...im sorry.

:/

yesterday..me, manda, and kerri well to the coldstone creamery? or whatever its called and got some icecream. :) and then we walked over to the mall. we just walked around and did nothing..but before we left, we got some chinese chicken stuff. hahaha. and it always makes me have this sick feeling in my stomach but then again i eat it anyways. i ahte ordering from there though because you cant understand one word that those chinese fucks are saying. 

yes..so then manda slept over and she pranked called some people. it was fun stuff. we pranked called mrs. crannell and mrs. voltz. hahahahahha. oh god. i almost pissed myself.

manda just went home to go and watch the dog til liek..1 and then shes coming back and we're going up to brits house. fun fun.

im going to camp this weekend and thats going to be funnn but bobby isnt going to be there. or steven.. oh well i guess? :/

its hot in my basement. fucckkk.


<333

the date on this stupid journal is so messed up and its making me mad.

yeah..so today i did nothing til around 4 30? ..charles came down and got his scooter and his cup thing and we sat in my basement for like..15 mins then went up to his house and he played vice city for 5 mins..then it froze so he acted like a retard and then he pissed me off so i left but then he chased after me and i hit him a few times and i went home.

now me, manda, and kerri are going to some icecream place then walking over to the mall. oh the excitement.

i feel like shit. i hate myself

lets see...i went up camp friday...didnt do anything because there was really nobody up there yet so i just walked around and watched tv all day.

Saturday, i hung out with megan, chasity, and bobby mostly. oh yeahhh..me, megan, and chasity were all on megans golf cart and megan followed bobby back in the field thing and she was going pretty fast and she turned really quick and i flew off the golf cart, rolled, and just laid there for a minute or two. Chasity flew off two but i had it the worst considering i was on the outside. i was laughing so hard that i almost pissed myself. hahahaha. it was so funny but it kinda hurt and i went shopping earlier and i had my new shorts on. :( lol. Bruce was finally up camp. i was surprised to see him becasue they said something about him being on drugs or some shit. haha. loser.

Sunday..it rained on and off and i got really muddy. Megan got me all soaked because she dumped a huge bottle of water on me and it wasnt fun. haha. then i got her back. lol. uhmmm...oh yes..and we were laying on megans swing thing and we went to lay back and it tipped and of course i was the only one to fall off. then..i was swinging..and i was getting pretty high up and it broke on me and i fell and now i have this huge stratch on my leg :/ hahahaha. i got hurt so much this weekend. its not even funny. 

we left today early around 9 and that was gay. i was going to stay the whole week up there with megan but my mom said i had to come home and shes gay. and i dont feel good and my leg hurts.

but other than getting hurt and all that stuff, this weekend was awesome. :)

<333

my dad called this morning asking to go to camp and stuff so i said yea..and now i feel like shit. i think ill be home sunday..if not then monday. fuck.

:/

yesterday i went down to the fair once again. my brother drove me, kerri, and phil down there. it was ok. we went on the swings :) muhahaha. 

i dont know what im doing today..probably nothing. but now i got to decide whether i wanna go to camp or not. i do and i dont. my mom might make me go cuz i have to help my dad with the damn dogs but gah. i dont know.
